column16:
Vocabulary Mapping
(IS, ID, CE, CNE, CWE)

column17: /one of the PID-3 or other available identifiers that uniquely links to the patient who's mother is represented in this RelatedPerson instance./

/a relationship type that represents "mother" should be populated with "MTH" as default if no further context is known, or either of "AOPTM", "GESTM", "NMTH", "NMTHF", "STPMTH" if the context is known.

column9: If not in http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/identifier-registry.html then determine whether organization or system

column19: Typically the assigning authority reflects an organization, but if it is an actual system (EHR 1 vs. EHR 2, both supporting the same organization where one cannot get more specific), then CX.4 should be mapped to .system
